16.3.11. Profiling Interface


Up: The MPI Tool Information Interface Next: Deprecated Interfaces Previous: Return Codes for the MPI Tool Information Interface

All requirements for the profiling interface, as described in Section Profiling Interface, also apply to the MPI tool information interface. All rules, guidelines, and recommendations from Section Profiling Interface apply equally to procedures defined as part of the MPI tool information interface.
